thread.title: LEGO's Instagram videos give tantalising glimpses of possible Star Wars: The Force Awakens scenes - Movies
thread.title_full: LEGO's Instagram videos give tantalising glimpses of possible Star Wars: The Force Awakens scenes - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Ali Plumb
title: LEGO's Instagram videos give tantalising glimpses of possible Star Wars: The Force Awakens scenes - Movies
text: If you don't already follow LEGO on Instagram, consider doing so, because it's full of adorable awesomeness - and potential glimpses of Star Wars: The Force Awakens.While these are, of course, LEGO-ified cartoony recreations of scenes within the upcoming Star Wars movie, they're still fascinating from a "What might this look like on the big screen?" angle. A video posted by LEGO (@lego) on Oct 14, 2015 at 6:54am PDTAbove is Kylo Ren's personal Command Shuttle, with his assistants goofing around and getting things wrong. Below is everyone's favourite ball droid BB-8 dashing into the Millennium Falcon, making noises we can only hope make their way into the film proper. A video posted by LEGO (@lego) on Oct 5, 2015 at 8:29am PDTLEGO toys have previously revealed titbits from the movie, as you can see from our pieces on just that topic here. Star Wars: The Force Awakens is released in UK cinemas on December 17.
